verses.verse: Now it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H8334>minister<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Moses <S%H4872><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>; now therefore <S%H6965>arise<s%>, go <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H5971>thou<s%>, and all this people, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I do <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H1121>them<s%>, even to the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Every <S%H4725>place<s%> that the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall tread <S%H1869>upon<s%>, to you have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1696>it<s%>, as I spake unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

From the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and this <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, shall be your <S%H1366>border<s%>.

There shall not any <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>: as I was with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so I will be with <S%H7503>thee<s%>; I will not fail <S%H5800>thee<s%>, nor forsake thee.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>; for thou shalt cause this <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>them<s%>.

Only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all the <S%H8451>law<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5493>thee<s%>: turn not from it to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, that thou mayest have good <S%H7919>success<s%> whithersoever thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>.

This <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, but thou shalt <S%H1897>meditate<s%> thereon <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6743>therein<s%>: for then thou shalt make thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>, and then thou shalt have good <S%H7919>success<s%>.

Have not I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2388>thee<s%>? Be strong and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>; be not <S%H6206>affrighted<s%>, neither be thou <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is with thee whithersoever thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>.

Pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3559>Prepare<s%> you <S%H6720>victuals<s%>; for within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye are to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> giveth you <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%>.

Your <S%H802>wives<s%>, your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; but ye shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> over <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%>, all the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, and shall help <S%H5826>them<s%>;

until <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> have <S%H5117>given<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%>, as he hath <S%H5117>given<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and they also have possessed the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>: then ye shall return unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession<s%>, and possess <S%H4872>it<s%>, which Moses the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>.

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, All that thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H834>whithersoever<s%> thou <S%H7971>sendest<s%> us we will <S%H3212>go<s%>.

According as we <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in all <S%H8085>things<s%>, so will we hearken unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>: only Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H4872>thee<s%>, as he was with Moses.

Whosoever <S%H376><s%> he be that shall <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against thy <S%H6310>commandment<s%>, and shall not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thy <S%H1697>words<s%> in all that thou <S%H6680>commandest<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, he shall be put to death: only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>.
